# Introduction

Welcome to **MACHUPS** - the AI-powered brand generation platform that creates complete brand packages in under 3 minutes.

## What is MACHUPS?

## Getting Started

1. Visit [machups.com](https://machups.com)
2. Enter your business idea
3. Select style preferences
4. Connect your Monad wallet (for NFT)
5. Generate your brand
6. Download complete package

## Pricing Tiers

### Free Tier
- 1-hour preview deployment
- Limited to 5 components
- No exports or NFTs
- **Perfect for testing**

### Starter - $10
- 24-hour preview deployment
- Full component library (30+ components)
- Export all files
- NFT certificate on Monad Testnet

### Pro - $49
- Permanent deployment
- Custom domain support
- NFT on Monad Mainnet (Genesis Edition)
- Advanced analytics
- GitHub integration

### Enterprise - $299/month
- Unlimited brands
- White-label option
- API access
- Custom AI training
- Team collaboration

## Built for Monad Blitz SF #18

MACHUPS was created for the Monad Blitz SF hackathon (December 6, 2025) showcasing:
- Fast transaction speeds on Monad
- Low gas fees for NFT minting
- Web3-native brand ownership
- On-chain provenance tracking
